body:
OK I've seen a bunch of these ama's so I figured I would do one as well xD Seeing as I am still pretty new and don't know a lot of people on here, this is a great way for you guys to get to know me!


Soo ask awayyyyy!

title: Dryve's AMA!

replies.body:
You're walking through the forest and you fall into a trap. There are 2 items in front of you; a cake and a D. To escape the trap you have to sit on one and eat the other. Which do you sit on, and which do you eat?

MODS I DIDNT WRITE THE ACTUAL WORD SO DON'T REMOVE THIS QUESTION.
replies.body_tagged:
You're walking through the forest and you fall into a trap. There are 2 items in front of you; a cake and a D. To escape the trap you have to sit on one and eat the other. Which do you sit on, and which do you eat?

MODS I DIDNT WRITE THE ACTUAL WORD SO DON'T REMOVE THIS QUESTION.

replies.body:
By D you mean donut right? Heh heh

Who said I wanna escape? Heh heh

Weeeelllll to be honest I'd probably eat the cake, maybe it would distract me from what's going on in the other end ya know? Lololol what a question eh
